column5: A cozy style apartment that is perfect for a stay in Dallas! Whether it be one night or one month, this apartment has everything you need!   You will be located in Oak Lawn area near many restaurants, shops, bars, and parks. Just a 5 minute drive to Love Field Airport and Uptown. Deep Ellum and Downtown area are about 10-15 minutes away.
column8: Convenient location near Love Field and Uptown
